verbose_text: After confirming the transfection efficiency (XREF_FIG), we found that in the miR-21-transfected cells, the protein levels of Smad7 were decreased compared with the negative control (NC) during osteogenesis induced by BMP9, whereas the transfection of the MMCs with anti-miR-21 did not markedly increase the protein level of Smad7 compared with the NC (XREF_FIG).
